Question: What actions did Peter and Strange take regarding the villains in *Spider-Man: No Way Home*?
Options:
A. Peter argued for helping the villains to change their fates.
B. Strange cast a spell to erase Peter's memory.
C. Peter-One attempted to kill the Goblin.
D. The Goblin stabbed Peter-Two during the fight.
Answer: A) Peter argued for helping the villains to change their fates., B) Strange cast a spell to erase Peter's memory., C) Peter-One attempted to kill the Goblin., D) The Goblin stabbed Peter-Two during the fight.

Question: What are the relationships between the characters in *Spider-Man: No Way Home*?
Options:
A. Strange attempted to help Peter-One against the Goblin.
B. The Goblin tried to kill Peter-One due to grief.
C. Connors was cured with the help of both Peter-One and Peter-Two.
D. Strange cast a spell to erase everyone's memory of Peter-One.
Answer: A) Strange attempted to help Peter-One against the Goblin., B) The Goblin tried to kill Peter-One due to grief., C) Connors was cured with the help of both Peter-One and Peter-Two.

Question: What actions did the characters take in relation to Peter-One and the Goblin in *Spider-Man: No Way Home*?
Options:
A. Strange attempted to erase Peter's memory to protect him.
B. The Goblin wanted to kill Peter-One out of grief.
C. Marko was healed by Peter-One and Peter-Two.
D. Strange fought against the Goblin to protect Peter-One.
Answer: A) Strange attempted to erase Peter's memory to protect him., B) The Goblin wanted to kill Peter-One out of grief., C) Marko was healed by Peter-One and Peter-Two.
